alert.note: Alert for Mercer (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 4:19AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Along and near the East River, near Willowton. This includes portions of southwest Virginia and southeast West Virginia, including the following counties, in southwest Virginia, Giles. In southeast West Virginia, Mercer. * WHEN...Until 415 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 419 AM EDT, gauge reports heavy rainfall and run-off will soon result in flooding along the East River. - Flood stage for the East River is 9 feet and the gauge in Willowton is currently at 8.9 feet and rising. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glen Lyn and Willowton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
